description:
Hoping to find the magic sphere, the gang find Niari who has been transformed into a merman!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hotoke to Mazoku no Nandaka Ne no Fukasoo na Innen no Koto
La profunda razón de la enemistad entre budas y demonios.
The Destiny of the Hotoke and Magic Gods
ホトケと魔族のなんだか根の深そーな因縁 のこと
